availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ailsa Riggs. Father of Logan Riggs, James Riggs, Mary Riggs, Daria Riggs, Finley Riggs, David Riggs, Savilla Riggs, Eunice Riggs, and Theodius Riggs. Farmer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in McLean County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 454. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, p. 35.
